snippet.title: Leander Longplay (Amiga) [QHD]
snippet.description:
Follow me on Twitter @ https://twitter.com/Al82_Retro
Get Great Retro Scene News @ http://www.vintageisthenewold.com
Developed by Travellers Tales and published by Psygnosis in 1991

As one of the best looking - and best sounding - Amiga games created, it was an easy choice to create a new recording of the game to take advantage of YouTube's higher resolution support. I've included full loops of the (fantastic) loading and title tunes at the end of the video, so be sure to use the time codes below if you want to check them out!

I somehow managed to miss the secret Lemmings zone from my original longplay, something I rectify here.

Credits
Coding: Jon Burton
Graphics: Jon Burton, Andrew Ingram
Music: Jon Burton, Matthew Simmonds, Tim Wright

Time Codes:
00:01:56 - World 01
00:33:09 - World 02
00:59:42 - World 03
01:08:48 - Lemmings secret
01:23:19 - Fighting Thanatos
01:23:55 - Ending

Bonus Content
01:26:49 - Loading Music (full loop)
01:32:10 - Title Music (full loop)
